pageContent.title: Introduction 2
pageContent.descriptionText:
You and Your CustomerYou recently used the ROPE questioning framework with Dr. Hayes, the lead psychiatrist at Sunnydale Psychiatry, to learn about the patient outcomes he is trying to achieve. You have also recently learned that two of Dr. Bennettâ€™s patients have stopped their treatment, complaining of side effects.

You plan to work further with Dr. Bennett, your main contact at Sunnydale, in order to understand even further the priorities of the practice and to explore ways to achieve the desired patient outcomes.

Please press CONTINUE to begin the simulation.
